title: Why i cant register in japan server ???
body: Riot say me why i cant register in Japan server ? {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}  i want to play in japan but cant register wtf !!!!

replies.body: You can use the regular [signup ](https://signup.jp.riotgames.jp/ja/signup/index?realm_key=jp)page, and change the region to Japan.  You can also transfer your account to the Japan region.  Make sure to also review our [Transfer FAQ ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751924-Account-Transfer-FAQ)in preparation of transfers, including content that may be transferred and support in the region you decide to join.
